hero.title: Junior Full Stack Developer
hero.desc: Software developer focused on full web solutions and process automation. Experience in Python (Flask), JavaScript (Next.js, React), as well as Power Apps, Power Automate, and MySQL.
chips: Available for travel and remote work

about.title: Developer Focused on Python, Web, and Automation
about.desc: I'm a software developer with experience building web applications from back-end to front-end. I have a strong command of Python with Flask for developing robust and scalable APIs, and I use JavaScript, React, and Next.js to create modern and responsive interfaces. My experience includes corporate process automation with Power Apps and Power Automate, in addition to data extraction and manipulation in Python. With a solid foundation in Computer Science, I seek to apply my technical and automation skills to innovative projects that create a real impact.

ucb.title: B.S. in Computer Science — UCB
ucb.desc: Education focused on software development, data structures, networking, and software engineering. Includes additional courses in JavaScript and HTML.

academy.title: EY Empodera Program
academy.desc: Training in leadership, programming logic, emotional intelligence, personal finance, and brand management.

post.title: Alura Courses — Front-end and Web Development
post.desc: Complementary training with practical courses in HTML, CSS, JavaScript, TypeScript, and React, focused on front-end best practices and creating modern web applications.
